<div class="news-title">AI-R2D2 Workshop at IEEE ICBC 2026</div>

Following our inaugural AI-R2D2 workshop at the ACM AI in Finance Conference (ICAIF 2025) in Singapore (November 2025), we are organizing the next edition at **IEEE ICBC 2026** in Brisbane, Australia (June 2026).

**Paper submission deadline:** March 25, 2026

**Co-organizers:** Zachary Feinstein, Wei Cai, Mary Lai Salvaña, Aaron Green, and Fernando Spadea.

[Learn more about AI-R2D2 →](https://ai-r2d2.github.io){.news-link target="_blank"}
:::

::: {.news-item data-year="2025" data-month="11"}
<div class="news-date">November 17, 2025</div>
<div class="news-title">FinSurvival Competition Winners Announced</div>

Oshani Seneviratne, along with Fernando Spadea, Kristin Bennett, Aaron Green, Adrien Pavão, and Corey Curran, is pleased to announce the successful completion of the **inaugural FinSurvival Competition** at ICAIF 2025. This event brought together outstanding teams who tackled the challenge of time-to-event survival modeling for DeFi lending markets.

::: {.news-highlight}
**Congratulations to the winning teams!**

- **First Prize:** Team Afinit (Jaehyeok Shin, hyeonwoo Jeon)
- **Second Prize:** Team ron0410530 (Rong-Lin Jian)
- **Third Prize:** Team A*STAR IHPC & SRM University-AP (Manjil Nepal, Parth Kiran Hanchate, Gao Fei, Wei Qingsong, Renuga Kanagavelu)
:::

We are grateful to all participants for their hard work, and we extend a special thank you to the ICAIF community for their support in making this competition possible. We also sincerely thank our financial supporters, ChaLearn, Ava Labs/Avalanche, and Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, for enabling this effort.

[Learn more about FinSurvival Competition →](https://finsurvival.github.io/){.news-link target="_blank"}
:::

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const keywordFilter = document.getElementById('keywordFilter');
  const yearFilter = document.getElementById('yearFilter');
  const monthFilter = document.getElementById('monthFilter');
  const clearFilter = document.getElementById('clearFilter');
  const newsItems = document.querySelectorAll('.news-item');

  if (!yearFilter || !monthFilter) return;

  function filterNews() {
    const keyword = keywordFilter ? keywordFilter.value.toLowerCase().trim() : '';
    const selectedYear = yearFilter.value;
    const selectedMonth = monthFilter.value;
    let visibleCount = 0;

    newsItems.forEach(item => {
      const itemYear = item.getAttribute('data-year');
      const itemMonth = item.getAttribute('data-month');
      const itemText = item.textContent.toLowerCase();
      
      let showItem = true;

      // Filter by keyword
      if (keyword && !itemText.includes(keyword)) {
        showItem = false;
      }

      // Filter by year
      if (selectedYear !== 'all' && itemYear !== selectedYear) {
        showItem = false;
      }

      // Filter by month
      if (selectedMonth !== 'all' && itemMonth !== selectedMonth) {
        showItem = false;
      }

      if (showItem) {
        item.style.display = '';
        visibleCount++;
      } else {
        item.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });

    let noMatchMsg = document.getElementById('no-match-message');
    
    if (visibleCount === 0) {
      if (!noMatchMsg) {
        noMatchMsg = document.createElement('div');
        noMatchMsg.id = 'no-match-message';
        noMatchMsg.className = 'news-item';
        noMatchMsg.style.textAlign = 'center';
        noMatchMsg.style.padding = '3rem';
        noMatchMsg.style.color = 'var(--bs-secondary)';
        noMatchMsg.innerHTML = '<p>No news items found matching your filters.</p>';
        const container = newsItems[0]?.parentElement;
        if (container) {
          container.appendChild(noMatchMsg);
        }
      }
      noMatchMsg.style.display = '';
    } else {
      if (noMatchMsg) {
        noMatchMsg.style.display = 'none';
      }
    }
  }

  if (keywordFilter) keywordFilter.addEventListener('input', filterNews);
  if (yearFilter) yearFilter.addEventListener('change', filterNews);
  if (monthFilter) monthFilter.addEventListener('change', filterNews);
  
  if (clearFilter) {
    clearFilter.addEventListener('click', function() {
      if (keywordFilter) keywordFilter.value = '';
      yearFilter.value = 'all';
      monthFilter.value = 'all';
      filterNews();
    });
  }
});
</script>
```
